about.title: About site
about.text1: This site is dedicated to choosing the best bead products. Everyone knows that beads are the most important thing in every home. No one can do without a portion of good beads. Therefore, our team decided to dedicate this site to this topic in order to brighten up the gray everyday life of the inhabitants of the Internet.
about.text2: We urge you to evaluate each bead product wisely in order to identify the true winner of all time. After all, not a few judgments depend on this rating. What can I say, it's no secret that the fate of the whole world depends on beads. After all, after some couple of decades, a person will wear clothes completely made of beads. And it is vital for everyone to prepare for this moment, so as not to look like a scoof in the eyes of other people.
about.text3: Remember that you are responsible for every evaluation given to the products. If the fact of intentional underestimation or overestimation of a particular product is discovered, a bead patrol will immediately move after you in order to give you a bead court.
about.text4: I would like to end with a quote from the main propagandist of beads (me):
about.text5: Beads are not just small glass beads, they are magic that can turn a thread into a work of art, and dreams into reality.
